meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a mosquito.
meanings.sent1: The buzzing sound of the tiny, mosquitoey insect filled the warm summer air.
meanings.sent2: The mosquitoey bite left a red, itchy mark on her arm.
meanings.sent3: The picnic turned into a mosquitoey feast for the pesky bugs.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley had a mosquitoey vibe, making her shiver with unease.
meanings.sent5: The swamp was so mosquitoey that she had to cover herself head to toe in protective clothing.

meanings.sent1: The stagnant pond became a mosquitoey breeding ground after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The camping trip was ruined by the mosquitoey swarm that descended at dusk.
meanings.sent3: The outdoor concert turned into a mosquitoey nightmare as the bugs swarmed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The old cabin in the woods was so mosquitoey, it felt like a scene from a horror movie.
meanings.sent5: The garden was so mosquitoey that even the flowers seemed to wilt under the constant buzzing.
